welcome.title: Welcome to Mintr!
welcome.description: Mintr is the dApp for SNX holders. If you've never used Mintr before, read through our quick introduction first.

whatIsSynthetix.title: What is Synthetix?
whatIsSynthetix.description: Synthetix is a decentralised synthetic asset issuance protocol built on Ethereum. These synthetic assets (Synths) are created by staking the Synthetix Network Token (SNX), and these Synths can be exchanged for each other directly with the Synthetix smart contracts on Synthetix.Exchange.

whyStakeSnx.title: Why stake SNX?
whyStakeSnx.description: SNX stakers receive two kinds of rewards. Firstly, they receive SNX staking rewards, which are created through the inflationary monetary policy.  Secondly, there’s Synth exchange rewards, which are generated by Synth trades on Synthetix.Exchange.

howStakeSnx.title: What do SNX stakers need to do?
howStakeSnx.description: All Synths need to be backed by staked SNX at a Collateralisation Ratio of 750%. SNX stakers need to manage their own ratio to be above this figure, which they can do by burning Synths to increase their ratio or minting Synths to reduce it. If they do this, they can collect weekly rewards.

risks.title: What are the risks?
risks.description: All SNX stakers create a ‘debt’ when they stake. Their debt begins as the amount of sUSD they initially mint, and fluctuates according to gains or losses made by other Synth holders. Any time anyone holds a Synth that appreciates in value, that gain is distributed proportionally between all the staked SNX holders’ debts. A staker must pay off their debt before they can unlock their staked SNX.

walletConnection.title: Please connect a wallet with your SNX holdings to start:

success.title: Select Wallet
success.subtitle: Please select the wallet you would like to use with Mintr

loading.connectInstructions: Please follow the prompts on your device to unlock your wallet.

intro.title: What would you like to do?

burn.title: Burn
burn.description: Burn sUSD to unlock staked SNX

claim.title: Claim
claim.description: Claim rewards from SNX staking and Synth exchanges

action.title: Mint
action.subtitle: Mint sUSD by staking your SNX. This gives you a Collateralization Ratio and a debt, allowing you to earn staking rewards.
action.instruction: Confirm or enter amount to mint:

action.title: Burn
action.subtitle: Burn sUSD to unlock your staked SNX. This increases your Collateralization Ratio and reduces your debt, allowing you to transfer your non-escrowed SNX.
action.instruction: Confirm or enter amount to burn:

action.title: Claim
action.subtitle: If you have staked your SNX and minted sUSD, you are eligible to collect two kinds of rewards: SNX staking rewards, and Synth exchange rewards generated on Synthetix.Exchange.
action.note: Note: if not collected within two periods, your rewards will be forfeited and rolled over into the fee pool.

action.title: Trade
action.subtitle: Trade your Synths for sUSD. For the full dApp, which allows you to trade between any Synths, use Synthetix.Exchange.

action.title: Transfer
action.subtitle: Transfer your ETH, SNX or Synths.

intro.title: Depot:
intro.subtitle: Deposit sUSD into a queue to be sold on Synthetix.Exchange for ETH. You can withdraw your sUSD at any time while waiting. Note: minimum deposit is 50 sUSD.

staking.title: Vest your SNX staking rewards in escrow
staking.subtitle: If you have staked your SNX and minted sUSD, you are eligible to receive SNX staking rewards, which you can vest here after they have been escrowed for 12 months.

tokenSale.title: Vest your escrowed SNX from the token sale
tokenSale.subtitle: If your SNX is still escrowed from the token sale, you can vest it here.

transactionSettings.title: Set gas price
transactionSettings.subtitle: Adjust the gas price (GWEI) below to set the transaction speed.

confirmation.title: Please confirm transaction
confirmation.subtitle: To continue, follow the prompts on your <1>walletType</1> Wallet.

complete.subtitle: Your transaction has been broadcast to the Ethereum network. You may close this window as the transaction will complete in the background.

error.notEnoughToMint: You cannot currently mint that much sUSD
error.notEnoughToBurn: You do not have that much sUSD to burn. You can find the best rate on dex.ag to buy more.

maintenance.title: Mintr is currently unavailable due to upgrades.
maintenance.subtitle: Sorry for the inconvenience, it will be back shortly.

mobileLanding.title: Mintr is currently unavailable for mobile and tablet.
mobileLanding.subtitle: We hope to have a mobile version available in the next few months.

tooltip.claim: To claim rewards, you must be within 1% of the Target Collateralization Ratio. If you are below this figure, you will be blocked from claiming rewards until you burn enough sUSD.
tooltip.debtBalance: Your debt begins as the amount of sUSD you initially mint, and fluctuates according to gains or losses made by other Synth holders. Any time someone holds a Synth that appreciates in value, that gain is distributed proportionally between all the staked SNX holders’ debts. To unlock all your staked SNX, you must first pay off your debt.
tooltip.synthsBalance: Synths are the synthetic assets in the Synthetix system, including sUSD, sBTC, iBTC, and all of the other assets available at Synthetix.Exchange. This figure is the total value of all the Synths held in this wallet. If you wish to convert some Synths back into sUSD, click the TRADE button.
